185636746.review: While this is a remake of the original game, I think it has done a great job on expanding and rewriting the original. I definitely liked this much better than the original Fairy Fencer F.

185448413.review: 很不错的游戏，画风和音乐都超赞。游戏也很耐玩，总共有三条线，女神线，邪神线和魔神线，必须三条线都玩过才能体验完全整个游戏的剧情。战斗也是挺有特色的，回合制战斗但又加入了走位和连招的设计，真的是很值得一玩的游戏。

185315317.review:
Story might not be much at first blush, but if you are a fan of JRPGs, anime and lots of grinding, you really can't go wrong with this one.

Also, it's funny as hell. Just make sure to switch voices to JP to avoid cringe.

185237485.review: best idea factory game i love ethel

184280148.review:
Personajes carismáticos, una historia simple pero entretenida, un combate muy divertido y todo acompañado de diseños increíbles, en definitiva lo que mas vas a disfrutar de este juego son las interacciones de los personajes, muy recomendado

Me ha encantado c:

183557410.review:
In general, a great classic JRPG. 8.5/10

[b][Pro 1: Storyline][/b]
[list]
     [*] 3 unique endings
     [*] Somewhat complex story
     [*] Each ending unlocks different maps, characters, NPCs
     [*] Each ending has varying gameplay difficulty
     [*] Occasional humorous or breaking-the-fourth-wall style of writing
[/list]

[b][Pro 2: Great RPG elements][/b]
[list]
     [*] Buffs are not just embedded in armor/accessories, and most buffs could be stacked (aka there are many ways to get buffs, I'll let you figure that out)
     [*] Max team size = 6, but
          - You have 11+ characters to choose from
          - Depending on the ending, you will be working with different allies
     [*] Lv100-ish is more than enough to clear the game
          - Level cap = Lv999, you can always power-level your way to 1-shoting everyone
     [*] RPG elements blend well with the story
[/list]

[b][Pro 3: Quality of Life][/b]
[list]
     [*] [b]Skip Button [/b]
          - Dialogues & Battle animations can be skipped
     [*] [b]Save Points[/b]: plenty
          - Available everywhere: in dungeon/main menu
     [*] [b]Game Difficulty[/b]: can be changed anytime
     [*] All allies (dead or alive, in combat or out of combat) will get XP! 
     [*] Reduced grinding by using DLC
     [*] 100% achievement guides are available in multiple languages
[/list]

[b][Con 1: Each storyline is short][/b]
[list]
     [*] The fun comes from you finishing all 3 endings. If you only choose to play 1 of them, that's around 6~7 hours of content at most
[/list]

[b][Con 2: Grinding/100% Achievement][/b]
[list]
     [*] To get the "10k kills" achievement, there's no alternatives than hard grind, to a point where you may be able to get Lv999 even before getting "10k kills"
     [*] Without DLC, it's worse
[/list]

[b][Con 3: Some maps are annoying to traverse][/b]
[list]
     [*] You know, the 10 switches-10 doors contraption bs costing plenty of time
     [*] Also, get a controller, using keyboard is no good
[/list]

[b][Con 4: It'd be better if you can set the combat voice volume][/b]
[b][Con 5: Occasional game crash if you open the game for too long][/b]
